dialogueLines.line: Haha. All right, I won't kill the boy.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: What? Are you afraid of guns now?
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I'm actually a zombie who lost her memory of who she was before she was born, so I don't even know who I am.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: But after all this hard work, after all these rap battles, I know a little bit more about myself now.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...I like to sing.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I enjoy sharing my voice with others, and I think it was my joy before I died to have so many people hear my voice.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I bet...that professional rap battle boy is singing to a lot of people too.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: He must have influenced so many people that they ask him to kill them or become friends with a boy who has UZI.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: If I erase that boy, no one will be able to hear his voice anymore...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I'm sure he won't be able to bear the thought of not being able to share his singing voice...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: That's why I won't touch that boy anymore!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I'm still going to win the rap battle competition and get my memory back! Yeah, I bet that's the way to go!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hey.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Oh, you don't have to tell me where the boy is anymore! I'm sorry I got involved!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I ain't gonna tell you where the boy is, but I know where two guys who like to rap are, so I'll tell you.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: What?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: If you like to sing, maybe a rap battle with someone who enjoys singing more would help you regain some of your memory. I don't know.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: !! Thanks! You're a real nice guy...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: BANG!!
GAAH!!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I told you not to come any closer! Get the hell out of here!
dialogueLines.speaker: pico
